::DevilDuer::

DevilDuer continues making his way across the desert, the two bots 
halfway to the Alliance base.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Jonathan Hogan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> {Scorpina}
> 
>     Behind the bot Scorpina frowned darkly. Either this Devilduer 
wasn't too
> bright or the Alliance leader was rather secretive. In either case 
she
> didn't really like the situation. She preferred knowing what her 
leaders
> capabilities and weaknesses were...and exploit them when necessary.
> 
>     She'd meet Zardus soon enough like the bot had said so best to 
observe
> the leaders movements now while she could...
